author: Nancy Cook and Dan Diamond
title: ‘A Darwinian approach to federalism’: Governors prep for new authority from Trump
description: State governors are getting more power from Trump, while fearing they lack the federal tools needed to fight the coronavirus crisis.
content: Trump in recent days has repeatedly praised his administrations efforts to deliver much-needed supplies to states, mobilize the private sector to develop faster tests for the coronavirus and stand up hospitals in hard-hit cities like New York even as official… [+4587 chars]
